name: AuraMax Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Immerse yourself in sound with AuraMax. Sleek, matte black over-ear headphones featuring 30+ hour battery life and plush earcups. Perfect for uninterrupted travel or focused work sessions.

name: Evergreen Peak Organic Cotton Tee
description: Soft, breathable unisex t-shirt in a gentle cream hue. Made from eco-friendly organic cotton featuring a minimalist mountain range graphic. Comfort meets conscious style.

name: TempoFit Smartwatch Tracker
description: Stay on top of your goals with TempoFit. Tracks heart rate, steps, and sleep with GPS on a clear round display. Water-resistant with an interchangeable charcoal grey silicone strap.

name: Artisan Brew Stainless Steel French Press
description: Brew rich, flavorful coffee with this classic 8-cup French Press. Durable, double-walled stainless steel construction keeps coffee hot longer. Easy to use and clean.

name: Nomad Trail Lightweight Waterproof Backpack
description: Your perfect companion for adventure or commute. Royal blue, 25L backpack made from tear-resistant nylon. Features multiple compartments, laptop sleeve, and padded straps.

name: Zenith High-Waisted Yoga Leggings
description: Flow freely in Zenith leggings. Deep teal, four-way stretch fabric moves with you. Moisture-wicking with a convenient hidden waistband pocket. Ideal for studio or street.

name: GrooveRover Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Take your tunes anywhere! Rugged, forest green portable speaker with IPX7 waterproof rating. Delivers rich bass and 12 hours of playtime. Includes carabiner clip.

name: Hearthstone Ceramic Mug with Bamboo Lid
description: Enjoy your favorite beverage in this modern 14oz ceramic mug. Features a unique speckled white glaze and includes a bamboo lid to keep drinks warm. Comfortable handle.

name: Seabreeze Men's Casual Linen Shirt
description: Stay cool and stylish in this light sky blue linen shirt. Breathable fabric, relaxed fit, button-down front, and roll-up long sleeves make it perfect for warm weather.

name: ErgoLift Adjustable Laptop Stand
description: Improve your workspace ergonomics. Sleek silver aluminum alloy stand adjusts height for better posture. Foldable and portable, fits laptops 10-17 inches.

name: Luxe Velvet Throw Pillow Cover (Emerald Green)
description: Add a touch of luxury with this soft, rich emerald green velvet pillow cover. 18x18 inch square with hidden zipper. (Insert not included).

name: Skyline Polarized Aviator Sunglasses
description: Classic unisex aviator sunglasses with a thin gold metal frame. Dark grey polarized lenses provide essential UV protection and reduce glare. Timeless style.

name: Rebel Chic Women's Faux Leather Moto Jacket
description: Unleash your inner rebel with this classic black moto jacket. Crafted from quality faux leather with an asymmetrical zip, zippered pockets, and a flattering fitted silhouette.

name: PrecisionPour Electric Gooseneck Kettle
description: Perfect your pour-over coffee or tea. This 1L electric kettle features precise temperature control and a gooseneck spout. Elegant matte black stainless steel design.

name: Nomad Slim Leather Card Holder Wallet
description: Carry your essentials in style. Minimalist tan wallet crafted from full-grain leather. Holds 4-6 cards and folded bills, featuring RFID blocking technology.
